citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
25-SEP-19.
* Inspector waited at the front gate to the facility. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers
given by the licensee. Inspector waited one hour for licensee to show up.
* Copy of the inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
25-SEP-19.
*  Inspector waited at the front gate to the facility.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers
given by the licensee.  Inspector waited one hour for licensee to show up.  
*  Copy of the inspection report was sent by regular mail.
